axis.description: Turns Joystick Axis to Mouse Axis so you can freelook in third person while flying. Condition prevents mouse from drifting up and to the left when in button mode
Turns Joystick Axis to Mouse Axis so you can freelook in third person while flying. Condition prevents mouse from drifting up and to the left when in button mode
Curves move the center of the axis to the idle throttle gate
Curves move the center of the axis to the idle throttle gate

button.description: Skipping buttons 36 through 40 to save room since they will never be used
